        public static com.sshtools.j2ssh.SshClient connect(String host,
                                   int port,
                                   String username,
                                   String password)
                                            throws IOException
        Connect. This action simulates all the actions required for a SSH connection
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of the host you want to connect to
        port - the port of the host you want to connect to
        username - the username required for authentication
        password - the password required for authentication
        Returns:
        the ssh client you connected to
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

                                throws IOException
        Puts the file to remote host.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of the client. The port number is by default 22
        username - the username required for authentication
        password - the password required for authentication
        localfilePath - the localfile path where the file is situated
        remotePath - the remote path where the file is going to be put
        fileName - the file name you want to put
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
